name: Quarry
description: Provides an interface to query Objects from an Array (collections) with minimal code.
features: Provides a simple interface to query Objects from an Array (collections).
Makes your code much readable and concise.

name: WhatsUp
description: A fun Service developed using Twilio WhatsApp API.
features: Preview Spotify songs on WhatsApp using spotify-preview (song name).
Get Github User Profile on WhatsApp using git-user (user name).
Get Github Repo Details on WhatsApp using git-repo (repo name).
Get NPM Registry Details on WhatsApp using npm-reg (registry name).

name: Text Similarity Analysis
description: Library to calculate Cosine similarity and Levenshtein distance between two sentences.

name: Wiki Snapshot
features: Recursively captures the DOM snapshot and Serialize to transmit over the Network.
